text: @realDonaldTrump You MIGHT sound reasonably intelligent if you let someone write for you. What I heard was emotion and empathy, things you’re incapable of expressing. So bounties on our Military isn’t worthy of your knowledge? Playing stupid like you did with the Coronavirus? Dereliction of Duty.
